description: Mobile techniques used by Asacub, ATT&CK software S0540 v1.0
name: Asacub (S0540)

techniques.comment: [Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) can collect the device’s contact list.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) can collect SMS messages as they are received.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) has encrypted C2 communications using Base64-encoded RC4.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) has been spread via phishing SMS messages that contain a link to a website that hosts the malicious APK file.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) can request device administrator permissions.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) has masqueraded as a client of popular free ads services.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) has implemented functions in native code.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) has stored encrypted strings in the APK file.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) can send SMS messages from compromised devices.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) has communicated with the C2 using HTTP POST requests.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) can collect various pieces of device information, including device model and OS version.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
[Asacub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0540) can collect various pieces of device network configuration information, such as mobile network operator.(Citation: Securelist Asacub)
